snippet: The most vulnerable suffer when technology contracts are bungled.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof David A Super holds the poor remain the most vulnerable to lapses in government computer systems, citing examples related to Medicaid and food stamps; urges Pres Obama to address these problems with same urgency he lent to fixing the government health care website.
lead_paragraph: The most vulnerable suffer when technology contracts are bungled.

headline.main: An Error Message for the Poor
headline.print_headline: An Error Message For the Poor
